dynSentence.name: QRY_BFCTTRFJNL_RECODE
dynSentence.sentence: SELECT A.* FROM (SELECT BFC_JRN_NO, CRE_DT, CRE_TM, TXN_COD, TX_PAY_AMT, TX_STS FROM BFCTTRFJNL WHERE USR_NO = ? ORDER BY CRE_DT DESC, CRE_TM DESC) TMP limit 0,10

dynSentence.name: QRY_BFCFNDBNS
dynSentence.sentence: SELECT * FROM (SELECT SUE.FND_BON_AMT,SUE.DIVD_DT, SUE.TX_AMT,SUE.FND_TX_DT,SUE.PRD_CD, SUE.DEF_BON_TYP,SUE.BON_UNIT,SUE.BON_TYP FROM ACMTCAPD APD, BFCFNDBNS SUE WHERE APD.CA_M_AC = SUE.CA_M_AC AND APD.USR_NO = ? ORDER BY SUE.FND_TX_DT DESC) TMP limit 0,10

dynSentence.name: BFCFNDBNS_AMT
dynSentence.sentence: SELECT * FROM (SELECT SUE.TX_AMT FROM ACMTCAPD APD, BFCFNDBNS SUE WHERE APD.CA_M_AC = SUE.CA_M_AC AND APD.USR_NO = ? ORDER BY SUE.FND_TX_DT DESC) TMP limit 0,1

dynSentence.name: SUM_BFCFNDBNS_AMT
dynSentence.sentence: SELECT * FROM (SELECT SUM(SUE.TX_AMT) TOTAL_AMT FROM ACMTCAPD APD, BFCFNDBNS SUE WHERE APD.CA_M_AC = SUE.CA_M_AC AND APD.USR_NO = ? ORDER BY SUE.FND_TX_DT DESC) TMP limit 0,1

dynSentence.name: QRY_BFCFILCTL_LAST
dynSentence.sentence: SELECT * FROM (SELECT FIL_DT LAST_FIL_DT FROM BFCFILCTL WHERE FIL_STS = '00' ORDER BY FIL_DT DESC ) TMP limit 0,1

dynSentence.name: QRY_BFCFNDBNS_LAST
dynSentence.sentence: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT TX_DT LAST_TX_DT FROM BFCFNDBNS ORDER BY TX_DT DESC ) TMP limit 0,1
